name: VacationBuddy
0:
”Alexa, ask Vacation Buddy my balance”
”Alexa, open Vacation Buddy”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vacation buddy
des:
You must have already registered with Vacation Accrual Buddy to use this skill.
https://vacation-accrual-buddy.azurewebsites.net/

This skill retrieves your data from Vacation Accrual Buddy.

Currently the skill will be able to retrieve only your vacation balance data.
